actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the lands comprising the Harris Neck National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Georgia, to the persons, or the heirs of the persons, who owned such lands prior to their condemnation by the U.S. in 1943.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States to and in specified lands comprising the Harris Neck National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Georgia to the persons, or the heirs of the persons, who owned such lands prior to their condemnation by the United States in 1943.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the lands comprising the Harris Neck National Wildlife Refuge, McIntosh County, Georgia, to the persons, or the heirs of the persons, who owned such lands prior to their condemnation by the U.S. in 1943.
